MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  L2 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Fenwick Street, Brunswick Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:58PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:13PM on 19th December 2020.
